About

We are licensed masonry contractors, operating in Modesto and the greater California Central Valley for over 30 years. We specialize in both commercial and residential projects ranging from artisanal fireplaces to industrial blockwork. Our pride is our quality and reliability, and we have built lasting structures throughout our community. For brick, block, or stone work, contact us for a quote!

Please include your phone number if you contact us by e-mail.
